summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Fifty-four and 14/100 ($54.14) Dollars, out of the Local Improvement Fund of Sturgus Road, et al, District No. 1531, Ordinance No. 16545, as a refund of assessment paid in error, authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor, and authorizing the City Treasurer to cancel the entry of said erroneous payment.
